participant_1.background:
I'm single, but my writing keeps me busy.
my parents met at woodstock.
I love making people happy with my music.
I went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends.
My moped is the envy of everyone on my block because it's so colorful and unique.

participant_2.background:
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.
i work in accounting.
i cannot get enough of lindsey spirlings music.
I have a library in my house where I keep all my favorite books, but The Great Gatsby is my favorite.
when people do not like my social media posts , it upsets me.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi, how are you doing?
I'm doing great! I just went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends. It was so much fun!
Wow, that sounds like a great time! I'm glad you had fun.
Thanks! Me too. What are you up to today?
I'm just working on some accounting stuff. It's not very exciting, but it's what I do for a living.
Oh, I see. I used to work in accounting, but I found it to be too boring.
Yeah, it can be pretty boring at times. But it pays the bills, so I can't complain too much.
That's true. I'm glad you're happy with your job.
Thanks! I am. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to write and play music. I also like to go to concerts and festivals.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I love to listen to music, but I'm not very good at playing any instruments.
That's okay! You can still enjoy music without being able to play an instrument.
I know, but I still wish I could play.
Well, you could always take lessons.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome! So, what's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby. I love the writing style and the characters.
I've heard good things about that book. I've been meaning to read it.
You should! It's a great book.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome
